name: UD_MD
description: UD MD WHATSAPP BOT USING BAILEYS

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Put the owner number here EG : 923165123719@s.whatsapp.net

ALIVE_IMG.description: Paste your image URL. If you don't have one, you can use this public URL.

ALIVE_MSG.value: Hello! UD MD Is Alive Now

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Make it true if you want the bot to see all statuses. For Off, use false.

MODE.description: public for public, private for self-use.

AUTO_VOICE.description: Put true/false for On/Off Auto Voice.

READ_MESSAGE.description: Make it true if you want the bot to read all messages immediately.
